title: Add copy-to-clipboard button for Student Number in Student Profile

requirements.text: In the Student Profile / Profile Settings screen, add a copy-to-clipboard control next to the displayed student number so the user can copy the raw (unformatted) student number to the system clipboard.

quotes: Öğrenci profiline girince profil kısmındaki öğrenci numarasını koplayama kısmı olsun

acceptanceCriteria: On the Profile Settings page (frontend/src/pages/ProfileSettings.tsx), the student number section shows a clickable copy icon/button adjacent to the student number display.
Clicking the copy control copies the unformatted studentNumber value (no spaces) to the clipboard.
If the Clipboard API is unavailable or the copy operation fails, the UI shows an error feedback state/message rather than failing silently.
After a successful copy, the UI provides a clear success feedback (e.g., toast or temporary label change) without navigating away from the page.
The copy control is keyboard-accessible and includes an accessible label (e.g., aria-label="Copy student number").

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only).
Keep changes limited to adding the copy-to-clipboard UI/logic; do not introduce unrelated i18n refactors in this change.
nonGoals: Implementing full-app internationalization (i18n) for all UI text.
Changing how student numbers are generated or persisted.
Adding backend endpoints or storage changes for student numbers.
